traits.name: Technically Still a Kid
traits.desc: As an eight-year-old, your physical development is still a work in progress. You're generally still a great deal weaker and slower than a similarly-trained adult. (-2 to base strength, agility, constitution, and chakra capacity)

traits.name: Perfect Vessel
traits.desc: You appear to have won the genetic lottery: you have an almost unbelievable level of natural physical ability! Your strength, agility, and stamina are all noticeably better than your peers'. There will certainly be no downsides to this. (+4 to base strength, agility, constitution, and chakra capacity, -25% XP to improve attributes from conditioning.)

traits.name: Prodigy
traits.desc: You pick up new techniques and concepts with preternatural ease. (+2 base intelligence, -25% XP to gain new skill and technique ranks.)

traits.name: Kekkei genkai: Seiton
traits.desc: Your clan is known for their distinctive kekkei genkai, granting the ability to use “star-natured” chakra, which can be used to produce semi-solid chakra constructs. These range in complexity from a simple chakra cloak, to hand-held weapons, extremely durable ropes and bindings, and ranged energy attacks. (provides access to Seiton jutsu)
